thread.section_title: Mister-Auto.ie Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mister-Auto.ie | www.mister-auto.ie
thread.title: Oleh

author: Oleh
title: Oleh
text:
On misterauto.ie I ordered multiple parts for 2 cars at once, the packages were broken down into 4 parcels which were delivered at different times and delayed me from working on my cars.
But after the parts arrived, one of them was a wrong part, which required me to purchase it from a car part store anyway.
Now I am going through a return process, which requires more of my time and wait up to 15 days for a refund.
Simply unacceptable.
